data.Title: Google Search Updates
data.Description: Google has been busy with several updates to its search engine, including testing auto-playing video thumbnails in search results, confirming that ads can now appear below organic featured snippets, and making more use of the right sidebar on desktop and overlays on mobile search results. Google Search Console also has new settings for businesses to enter their shipping and return policies.

data.Title: Bing Tests Voting on Search Results
data.Description: Bing is testing a new feature that allows users to vote on search results, with the percentage of votes for those who voted it up versus voted it down displayed.

data.Title: Google's AI Overviews
data.Description: Google's AI overviews in search results have not dropped to 7%, as previously reported. Tracking shows that they still make up around 14% of search results. However, Reddit and Quora citations in Google AI Overviews have significantly decreased.

data.Title: OpenAI's Search Engine
data.Description: OpenAI is reportedly working on a search product as part of a larger deal with The Atlantic.

data.Title: Majestic Discontinues Disavow Links Feature
data.Description: Majestic will discontinue its disavow links feature, stating that the company never encouraged its use and does not believe it is an effective way to identify toxic links.

data.Title: Google and 3D/AR Images in Search
data.Description: 3D/AR objects are appearing in Google Search results for more retailers. This feature, previously in beta, is now rolling out more broadly.

data.Title: COPIED Act: Protecting Content from AI
data.Description: The COPIED Act, a new Senate bill, seeks to protect artists' and journalists' content from unauthorized AI use. The bill aims to give content owners more control over how their work is used and prevent AI-generated misinformation.

data.Title: Google's Focus on Forums
data.Description: Discussion boards are gaining traction in Google's search results. Google now prioritizes forums, making it crucial for websites to foster community and engagement to improve their search rankings.
